template: We have an image with these objects: ['bench', 'hat', 'street', 'parking lot', 'car', 'grass', 'sidewalk', 'tree shadow', 'concrete', 'street light', 'street sign', 'parking lot', 'car', 'street', 'parking lot', 'car', 'street', 'parking lot', 'car', 'street']. No other keys.
